nodes.text: The Carpastor system was a star system that was located in the Rolion sector, within the Outer Rim Territories and Trans-Hydian regions. The system was the location of the phenomenon known as the Carpastor Comet Swarm.
The Carpastor system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square Q-7.
